oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A Logan’s Roadhouse restaurant tent serves food in the River Plantation neighborhood in the aftermath of the May 2010 flood
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
A photograph of a Logan’s Roadhouse Restaurant tent serving food in the River Plantation neighborhood of Bellevue in the aftermath of the May 2010 Nashville flood.
Forms part of the Nashville Room Flood 2010 Digital History Project.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Seldon, Debbie (Photographer)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Special Collections Division of the Nashville Public Library, 615 Church Street, Nashville, Tennessee, 37219
